equable.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who is equable remains calm and happy and does not often get annoyed
equable.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a young man with a naturally equable temperament
equable.translation[0].definitions[1].de: equable weather is neither too hot nor too cold
equable.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a place with a pleasant, equable climate
